entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Nanaimo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:43 PM PST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Nanaimo Airport 3:00 PM PST Monday 27 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: 0.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: -0.3°C
Wind: NE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2
